name: Titanium.UI.Toolbar
summary: A Toolbar can contain buttons, as well as certain other widgets, including text fields and labels.

methods.name: collapseActionViews
methods.summary: Collapses expanded ActionViews if there is any

methods.name: dismissPopupMenus
methods.summary: Collapses expandend ActionViews and hides overflow menu

methods.name: getContentInsetEnd
methods.summary: Returns the margin at the toolbar's content end.

methods.name: getContentInsetLeft
methods.summary: Returns the margin on the left of the toolbar's content.

methods.name: getContentInsetRight
methods.summary: Returns the margin on the right of the toolbar's content.

methods.name: getContentInsetStart
methods.summary: Returns the margin at the toolbar's content start.

methods.name: getCurrentContentInsetEnd
methods.summary: Returns the margin at the toolbar's content end that will be used with the current configuration of the toolbar.

methods.name: getCurrentContentInsetLeft
methods.summary: Returns the margin on the left of the toolbar's content that will be used with the current configuration of the toolbar.

methods.name: getCurrentContentInsetRight
methods.summary: Returns the margin on the right of the toolbar's content that will be used with the current configuration of the toolbar.

methods.name: getCurrentContentInsetStart
methods.summary: Returns the margin at the toolbar's content start that will be used with the current configuration of the toolbar.

methods.name: hasExpandedActionView
methods.summary: Checks if the toolbar is currently hosting an expanded action view.

methods.name: hideOverflowMenu
methods.summary: Hides the overflow menu if there is one.

methods.name: isOverflowMenuShowing
methods.summary: Checks if the toolbar is currently hosting an expanded action view.

methods.name: setContentInsetsAbsolute
methods.summary: Sets the content margins of the toolbar

parameters.name: insetLeft
parameters.summary: Offset at the left side of the content

parameters.name: insetRight
parameters.summary: Offset at the right side of the content

methods.name: setContentInsetsRelative
methods.summary: Sets the content margins relative to the layout direction

parameters.name: insetStart
parameters.summary: Offset before the start of the content

parameters.name: insetEnd
parameters.summary: Offset after the end of the content

methods.name: showOverflowMenu
methods.summary: Shows the overflow menu if there is one

properties.name: barColor
properties.summary: Background color for the toolbar, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description:
To use a background image on the toolbar, either barColor must be a fully or partially transparent color, or the translucent property must be true.

To use a background gradient on a toolbar, barColor must be 'transparent' and the the translucent property must be true.

For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: contentInsetEndWithActions
properties.summary: Returns the margin after the toolbar's content when there are action buttons.

properties.name: contentInsetStartWithNavigation
properties.summary: Returns the margin at the toolbar's content start when there is a navigation button.

properties.name: extendBackground
properties.summary: If true, the background of the toolbar extends upwards.
properties.description: This property allows the user to specify that the toolbar's background show through the status bar. and is only intended to be used with toolbars hosted in windows with no navigation controllers. The toolbar must be placed at the top of the screen just below the status bar and used as an ActionBar on Android for this property to work as expected. This must be specified at creation.
properties.default: Undefined. Behaves as if set to false.

properties.name: items
properties.summary: An array of buttons (or other widgets) contained in the toolbar.

properties.name: logo
properties.summary: Image to be used as a logo in the Toolbar.
properties.description: This property is used only when the Toolbar is used as an ActionBar.

properties.name: navigationIcon
properties.summary: Image to be used for a navigation icon.
properties.description: This property is used only when the Toolbar is used as an ActionBar.

properties.name: overflowIcon
properties.summary: Image to be used for the overflow menu.
properties.description: This property is used only when the Toolbar is used as an ActionBar.

properties.name: titleTextColor
properties.summary: Color string with any Titanium supported format

properties.name: translucent
properties.summary: If true, a translucent background color is used for the toolbar.
properties.description: Note that if translucent is false, views under the toolbar are hidden, even if barColor is set to a semi-transparent or transparent color.
